message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I believe it's a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying, considering the product's value to me is $12000.
